segments.text: Have you brought the receipt with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't . I left it home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , but we can't do anything without the receipt . Come back with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know . I'll go to get it . How late will you be open ?
segments.speaker: S2
